snippet: Jason and Randy Sklar make statistics humorous on their show “The United Stats of America,” on History.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews History Channel series The United Stats of America, hosted by Jason and Randy Sklar. (M)
lead_paragraph: Gotta love a television show that includes an expert who says, ''It's actually safer to eat a sandwich off the toilet seat than your desk.'' The show is ''The United Stats of America,'' and in it the Sklar brothers, Jason and Randy, are on a mission to kill the common perception that statistics are boring. They explore the numbers behind things you thought you knew and things you ought to know, but this is no blackboard exercise.

headline.main: Why Your Desk Is Deadlier Than Your Toilet Seat
